long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Locked In is the ultimate Chrome extension designed to help professionals stay focused and productive. Whether youâ€™re working from home, in the office, or studying for exams, Locked In empowers you to block out distractions and maintain your workflow.

Features:

Customizable Blocking: Easily block specific websites or URLs during your work hours. For instance, restrict access to Instagram.com on weekdays from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM to ensure you stay focused.

Flexible Schedules: Set up multiple blocking schedules tailored to your routine. Have different time blocks for weekdays and weekends to align with your productivity goals.

Whitelist: Allow access to essential websites that aid in your work while keeping distractions at bay.

Emergency Override: Grant yourself access in case of an emergency with a brief cooling-off period to discourage impulsive changes.

User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for easy setup and management of your blocked sites and schedules.

Focus Timer: Utilize the built-in focus timer to work in intervals with breaks in between, following the Pomodoro technique to maximize productivity.

Progress Reports: Track your productivity with detailed reports on your focus times and blocked attempts.

Why Choose Locked In?

Boost Productivity: Eliminate digital distractions and stay focused on your tasks.

Customizable Control: Tailor the extension to fit your unique work schedule and habits.

Enhanced Focus: Reinforce discipline and time management skills to achieve your professional goals.

Get Locked In. Stay Focused. Block Out Distraction.

Download Locked In today and transform your working habits by creating a distraction-free digital environment. Your productivity journey starts now!
